document_data.name: Flyndagol
document_data.mainbody: '''Flyndagol''' was an isolated city in [[Durpar]] in the [[Shining Lands]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Geography:
Located in the far northwest corner of Durpar, Flyndagol sat on the west bank of the [[River Xon]]. Its close proximity to [[Raurin]] and the [[A-Ling Shan]] mountains made it a dangerous place to live.

Temperatures in and around Flyndagol were uncomfortably hot compared to the other cities of Durpar.
document_data.Activites:
Trade between Flyndagol and the [[elf|elves]] of the [[Ajmer Forest]] was common. Flyndagol was also the first line of defense against any attack from [[Ulgarth]] or [[orc]]s from the [[Dustwall Mountains|Mountains of War]].

Because of the intense daytime heat, most businesses in Flyndagol opened after noon and stayed opened well into the night. Most of the streets and shops were lit via ''[[continual light]]'' spells to eliminate any added heat from conventional light sources.
document_data.Inhabitants: Flyndagol maintained a standing force of 1,000 soldiers. Because of the amicable trade relations, the elves of the Ajmer provided skilled archers for military support as well.
